00060 /*===========================================================================
00061  *      Description :   Symbol table management.
00062  *==========================================================================*/
00063 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00064 #include <config.h>
00065 #include <stdio.h>

00074 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00075 /*       
00076  *      Each symbol is uniquely identified by the symbol name
00077  *      and the symbol type fields. The ptr field can be used
00078  *      to connect a user defined data structure to the symbol.
00079  *      valid types are non-negative.
00080  */
00081 #define C_INVALID_SYMBOL        -1
00082 #define C_DELETED_SYMBOL        -2
00083 
00084 #if 0
00085         /* DMG - 5/95 - typdefs moved to .h file */
00086 typedef struct _C_Symbol
00087 {
00088   char *name;                   /* symbol name */
00089   int type;                     /* symbol type */
00090   Integer value;                /* a general purpose value carrier */
00091   Pointer ptr;                  /* a general purpose pointer */
00092 }
00093 _C_Symbol, *C_Symbol;
00094 
00095 typedef struct _SymTbl
00096 {
00097   C_Symbol array;               /* symbol array */
00098   Integer size;                 /* table size */
00099   int mode;                     /* type matching style */
00100 }
00101 _SymTbl, *SymTbl;
00102 #endif
00103 
00104 _SymTbl TBL[C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE] = { { 0 } };        /* symbol tables */
00105 static int next_tbl = 0;        /* next symbol table */
00106 
00107 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00108 static C_Symbol
00109 find_symbol (SymTbl tbl, char *name, int type, int new_entry)
00110                 /* symbol table */
00111                 /* symbol name */
00112                 /* symbol type */
00113                 /* create new entry */
00114 {
00115   C_Symbol table;
00116   int length, key, limit, mode;
00117   int hash_size, hash_pos, increment, trial;
00118   length = C_strlen (name);     /* length of the string */
00119   /* Quadratic probing */
00120   /* initialize hash table parameters */
00121   table = tbl->array;
00122   hash_size = (int) tbl->size;
00123   mode = tbl->mode;
00124   /* compute initial hash position */
00125   if (length < 1)
00126     fprintf (stderr, "> called Hash with null name\n");
00127   key =
00128     (type * 377) + (name[0] * 231) + (name[length - 1] * 17) +
00129     (name[(length - 1) / 2] * 96) + (name[(length - 1) * 3 / 4] * 1027) +
00130     (name[(length - 1) / 4] * 3);
00131   hash_pos = key % hash_size;
00132   /* iterate until exit condition is met */
00133   increment = 1;
00134   limit = hash_size * 4;
00135   if (new_entry)
00136     {
00137       int tp, found = 0;
00138       C_Symbol sym = NULL;
00139       for (trial = limit; (trial > 0) && (!found); trial--)
00140         {
00142           sym = table + hash_pos;
00143           tp = sym->type;
00145           hash_pos = (hash_pos + increment) % hash_size;
00146           increment++;
00147           /* test if it is a deleted/invalid entry */
00148           found = ((tp == C_DELETED_SYMBOL) || (tp == C_INVALID_SYMBOL));
00149         }
00150       if (found)
00151         return sym;
00152       fprintf (stderr, "> failed to create a new symbol table entry\n");
00153     }
00154   else
00155     {
00156       if (mode == C_MATCH_BY_EXACT_TYPE)
00157         {
00158           C_Symbol sym;
00159           for (trial = limit; trial > 0; trial--)
00160             {
00162               sym = table + hash_pos;
00164               hash_pos = (hash_pos + increment) % hash_size;
00165               increment++;
00167               if ((sym->type == C_INVALID_SYMBOL) ||
00168                   ((sym->type == type) && !strcmp (sym->name, name)))
00169                 return sym;
00170             }
00171         }
00172       else
00173         {
00174           C_Symbol sym;
00175           for (trial = limit; trial > 0; trial--)
00176             {
00178               sym = table + hash_pos;
00180               hash_pos = (hash_pos + increment) % hash_size;
00181               increment++;
00183               if ((sym->type == C_INVALID_SYMBOL) ||
00184                   (((sym->type & type) != 0) && !strcmp (sym->name, name)))
00185                 return sym;
00186             }
00187         }
00188       fprintf (stderr, "> failed to find a symbol table entry\n");
00189     }
00190   /* went into a recursive loop, apparently the table
00191    * is not designed correctly.
00192    */
00193   fprintf (stderr, "> number of rehashes = %d\n", limit - trial);
00194   fprintf (stderr, "> tbl=%d, name=\"%s\", type=%d, new=%d\n",
00195 #if LP64_ARCHITECTURE
00196            (int)((long)tbl - (long)TBL),
00197 #else
00198            (int)tbl - (int)TBL,
00199 #endif
00200            name, type, new_entry);
00201   fprintf (stderr, "> table size=%d, mode=%d\n", tbl->size, tbl->mode);
00202 #ifdef ABORT_ON_SPILL
00203   abort ();
00204 #endif
00205   C_assert (0, "c_symbol: too many hash steps");
00206   return 0;
00207 }
00208 
00209 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00210 static int
00211 find_empty_entry (SymTbl tbl, char *name, int type, int new_entry)
00212                 /* symbol table */
00213                 /* symbol name */
00214                 /* symbol type */
00215                 /* create new entry */
00216 {
00217   C_Symbol table;
00218   int length, key, limit, mode;
00219   int hash_size, hash_pos, increment, trial;
00220   length = C_strlen (name);     /* length of the string */
00221   /* Quadratic probing */
00222   /* initialize hash table parameters */
00223   table = tbl->array;
00224   hash_size = (int) tbl->size;
00225   mode = tbl->mode;
00226   /* compute initial hash position */
00227   if (length < 1)
00228     fprintf (stderr, "> called Hash with null name\n");
00229   key =
00230     (type * 377) + (name[0] * 231) + (name[length - 1] * 17) +
00231     (name[(length - 1) / 2] * 96) + (name[(length - 1) * 3 / 4] * 1027) +
00232     (name[(length - 1) / 4] * 3);
00233   hash_pos = key % hash_size;
00234   /* iterate until exit condition is met */
00235   increment = 1;
00236   limit = hash_size * 4;
00237   if (new_entry)
00238     {
00239       int tp, found = 0;
00240       C_Symbol sym;
00241       for (trial = limit; (trial > 0) && (!found); trial--)
00242         {
00244           sym = table + hash_pos;
00245           tp = sym->type;
00247           hash_pos = (hash_pos + increment) % hash_size;
00248           increment++;
00249           /* test if it is a deleted/invalid entry */
00250           found = ((tp == C_DELETED_SYMBOL) || (tp == C_INVALID_SYMBOL));
00251         }
00252       if (found)
00253         return 1;
00254       fprintf (stderr, "> failed to create a new symbol table entry\n");
00255     }
00256   else
00257     {
00258       if (mode == C_MATCH_BY_EXACT_TYPE)
00259         {
00260           C_Symbol sym;
00261           for (trial = limit; trial > 0; trial--)
00262             {
00264               sym = table + hash_pos;
00266               hash_pos = (hash_pos + increment) % hash_size;
00267               increment++;
00269               if ((sym->type == C_INVALID_SYMBOL) ||
00270                   ((sym->type == type) && !strcmp (sym->name, name)))
00271                 return 1;
00272             }
00273         }
00274       else
00275         {
00276           C_Symbol sym;
00277           for (trial = limit; trial > 0; trial--)
00278             {
00280               sym = table + hash_pos;
00282               hash_pos = (hash_pos + increment) % hash_size;
00283               increment++;
00285               if ((sym->type == C_INVALID_SYMBOL) ||
00286                   (((sym->type & type) != 0) && !strcmp (sym->name, name)))
00287                 return 1;
00288             }
00289         }
00290     }
00291   return 0;
00292 }

00294 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00296 int
00297 C_open (int max_size, int mode)
00298 {
00299   int new_id;
00300   SymTbl T;
00301   C_Symbol sym;
00302   int size;
00303   int cur_try;
00304 
00305   if ((mode != C_MATCH_BY_EXACT_TYPE) && (mode != C_MATCH_BY_AND_TYPE))
00306     {
00307       C_assert (0, "C_open: illegal match mode");
00308       return -1;
00309     }
00310   if (max_size < 64)
00311     {
00312       C_assert (0, "C_open: size must be at least 64");
00313       return -1;
00314     }
00315   size = max_size;
00317   new_id = next_tbl;
00318 
00319 #if 0
00320   if (new_id >= C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE)
00321     {
00322       C_assert (0, "C_open: run out of symbol tables");
00323       return -1;
00324     }
00325 #endif
00326 
00327   /* DMG - we now allow re-use of the deleted symbol tables;
00328      search for entry with NULL C_Symbol, wrapping around if
00329      necessary */
00330 
00331   /* BCC - the following code already accesses out-of-bound memory - 9/9/97 */
00332 #if 0
00333   while (((TBL + new_id)->array != NULL) && new_id != (next_tbl - 1))
00334     {
00335 
00336       new_id++;
00337 
00338       if (new_id >= C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE)
00339         new_id = 0;
00340     }
00341 #endif
00342   for (cur_try = 0; cur_try < C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE; cur_try++, new_id++)
00343     {
00344       new_id %= C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE;
00345       if ((TBL + new_id)->array == NULL)
00346         break;
00347     }
00348 
00349 
00350   T = TBL + new_id;
00351 
00352   if (T->array != NULL)
00353     {
00354       C_assert (0, "C_open: run out of symbol tables");
00355       return -1;
00356     }
00357 
00358   next_tbl = new_id + 1;
00359 
00360   sym = (C_Symbol) C_malloc (((int) (sizeof (_C_Symbol) * size)));
00361   if (sym == 0)
00362     {
00363 #if LP64_ARCHITECTURE
00364       fprintf (stderr, "> C_malloc(%ld) returns NULL\n",
00365                sizeof (_C_Symbol) * size);
00366 #else
00367       fprintf (stderr, "> C_malloc(%d) returns NULL\n",
00368                sizeof (_C_Symbol) * size);
00369 #endif
00370       fprintf (stderr, "> C_open(%d, %d)\n", max_size, mode);
00371       C_assert (0, "C_open: failed to allocate symbol table array");
00372       return -1;
00373     }
00375   T->mode = mode;
00376   T->size = size;
00377   T->array = sym;
00378   C_clear (new_id);
00379 #ifdef DEBUG_OPEN
00380   if (new_id == 2)
00381     abort ();
00382 #endif
00383   return new_id;
00384 }

00386 
00389 void
00390 C_delete_tbl (int tbl_id)
00391 {
00392   Integer i;
00393   SymTbl T = TBL + tbl_id;
00394   C_Symbol sym;
00395 
00396   if (tbl_id == -1)
00397     return;
00398 
00399   if ((tbl_id < 0) || (tbl_id > C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE))
00400     C_assert (0, "C_delete_tbl: illegal tbl_id");
00401   sym = T->array;
00402   for (i = T->size; i > 0; i--)
00403     {
00404       /* BCC - was memory leakage */
00405       if (sym->type != C_INVALID_SYMBOL)
00406         free (sym->name);
00407       sym->name = 0;
00408       sym->type = C_INVALID_SYMBOL;
00409       sym->value = 0;
00410       sym->ptr = 0;
00411       sym++;
00412     }
00413 
00414   free (T->array);
00415   T->array = 0;
00416 }
00417

00419 
00421 void
00422 C_clear (int tbl_id)
00423 {
00424   Integer i;
00425   SymTbl T = TBL + tbl_id;
00426   C_Symbol sym;
00427 
00428   if (tbl_id == -1)
00429     return;
00430 
00431   if ((tbl_id < 0) || (tbl_id > C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE))
00432     C_assert (0, "C_clear: illegal tbl_id");
00433   sym = T->array;
00434   for (i = T->size; i > 0; i--)
00435     {
00436       sym->name = "";
00437       sym->type = C_INVALID_SYMBOL;
00438       sym->value = 0;
00439       sym->ptr = 0;
00440       sym++;
00441     }
00442 }

00445 /* BCC - added for garbage collection - 8/20/96 */
00447 void
00448 C_clear_free_all (int tbl_id)
00449 {
00450   Integer i;
00451   SymTbl T = TBL + tbl_id;
00452   C_Symbol sym;
00453 
00454   if (tbl_id == -1)
00455     return;
00456 
00457   if ((tbl_id < 0) || (tbl_id > C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE))
00458     C_assert (0, "C_clear: illegal tbl_id");
00459   sym = T->array;
00460   for (i = T->size; i > 0; i--)
00461     {
00462       if (sym->name && sym->name[0])
00463         free (sym->name);
00464       sym->name = "";
00465       sym->type = C_INVALID_SYMBOL;
00466       sym->value = 0;
00467       sym->ptr = 0;
00468       sym++;
00469     }
00470 }

00501 void
00502 C_clear_attr (int tbl_id)
00503 {
00504   Integer i;
00505   SymTbl T = TBL + tbl_id;
00506   C_Symbol sym;
00507   if ((tbl_id < 0) || (tbl_id > C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE))
00508     C_assert (0, "C_clear_attr: illegal tbl_id");
00509   sym = T->array;
00510   for (i = T->size; i > 0; i--)
00511     {
00512       sym->value = 0;
00513       sym->ptr = 0;
00514       sym++;
00515     }
00516 }
00518 void
00519 C_update (int tbl_id, char *name, int type, Integer value, Pointer ptr)
00520 {
00521   SymTbl tbl = TBL + tbl_id;
00522   C_Symbol sym;
00523   if (type < 0)
00524     C_assert (0, "C_update: type must be positive");
00525   if ((tbl_id < 0) || (tbl_id > C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE))
00526     C_assert (0, "C_update: illegal tbl_id");
00527   sym = find_symbol (tbl, name, type, 0);       /* find old entry */
00528   /* create a new symbol if necessary */
00529   if (sym->type == C_INVALID_SYMBOL)
00530     {
00531       sym = find_symbol (tbl, name, type, 1);   /* find empty slot */
00532       sym->type = type;
00533       sym->name = C_strsave (name);
00534     }
00535   sym->value = value;
00536   sym->ptr = ptr;
00537 }
00539 int
00540 C_find (int tbl_id, char *name, int type, Integer * value, Pointer * ptr)
00541 {
00542   SymTbl tbl = TBL + tbl_id;
00543   Integer v;
00544   Pointer p;
00545   C_Symbol sym;
00546   if (type < 0)
00547     C_assert (0, "C_find: type must be positive");
00548   if ((tbl_id < 0) || (tbl_id > C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE))
00549     C_assert (0, "C_find: illegal tbl_id");
00550   sym = find_symbol (tbl, name, type, 0);
00551   v = sym->value;
00552   p = sym->ptr;
00553   /* if not found, return 0 */
00554   if (sym->type == C_INVALID_SYMBOL)
00555     {
00556       if (value != 0)
00557         *value = 0;
00558       if (ptr != 0)
00559         *ptr = 0;
00560       return 0;
00561     }
00562   else
00563     {
00564       if (value != 0)
00565         *value = v;
00566       if (ptr != 0)
00567         *ptr = p;
00568       return 1;
00569     }
00570 }
00572 int
00573 C_full (int tbl_id, char *name, int type)
00574 {
00575   SymTbl tbl = TBL + tbl_id;
00576   if (type < 0)
00577     C_assert (0, "C_full: type must be positive");
00578   if ((tbl_id < 0) || (tbl_id > C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE))
00579     C_assert (0, "C_full: illegal tbl_id");
00580   if (find_empty_entry (tbl, name, type, 0))
00581     return 0;
00582   return 1;
00583 }
00585 int
00586 C_delete (int tbl_id, char *name, int type)
00587 {
00588   SymTbl tbl = TBL + tbl_id;
00589   C_Symbol sym;
00590   if (type < 0)
00591     C_assert (0, "C_delete: type must be positive");
00592   if ((tbl_id < 0) || (tbl_id > C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE))
00593     C_assert (0, "C_delete: illegal tbl_id");
00594   sym = find_symbol (tbl, name, type, 0);
00595   /* if not found, return 0 */
00596   if (sym->type == C_INVALID_SYMBOL)
00597     {
00598       return 0;
00599     }
00600   else
00601     {
00602       sym->type = C_DELETED_SYMBOL;
00603       return 1;
00604     }
00605 }
00607 int
00608 C_forall (int tbl_id, C_Function fn)
00609 {
00610   Integer i;
00611   int size;
00612   SymTbl T = TBL + tbl_id;
00613   C_Symbol sym;
00614   int type;
00615   if ((tbl_id < 0) || (tbl_id > C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE))
00616     C_assert (0, "C_forall: illegal tbl_id");
00617   size = 0;
00618   if (fn == 0)
00619     {
00620       sym = T->array;
00621       for (i = T->size; i > 0; i--)
00622         {
00623           type = sym->type;
00624           size += (type >= 0);
00625           sym++;
00626         }
00627     }
00628   else
00629     {
00630       sym = T->array;
00631       for (i = T->size; i > 0; i--)
00632         {
00633           type = sym->type;
00634           if (type >= 0)
00635             {
00636               size += 1;
00637               (*fn) (sym->name, type, sym->value, sym->ptr);
00638             }
00639           sym++;
00640         }
00641     }
00642   return size;
00643 }
00644 /* BCC - find out the index - 3/22/97 */
00645 int
00646 C_find_index (int tbl_id, void *ptr)
00647 {
00648   Integer i;
00649   int size;
00650   SymTbl T = TBL + tbl_id;
00651   C_Symbol sym;
00652   int type;
00653   if ((tbl_id < 0) || (tbl_id > C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE))
00654     C_assert (0, "C_forall: illegal tbl_id");
00655   size = 0;
00656   sym = T->array;
00657   for (i = T->size; i > 0; i--)
00658     {
00659       type = sym->type;
00660       if (type >= 0)
00661         {
00662           size += 1;
00663           if ((void *) sym->ptr == ptr)
00664             return T->size - i;
00665         }
00666       sym++;
00667     }
00668   return -1;
00669 }
00670 /* BCC - find out the index - 3/22/97 */
00671 Pointer C_find_from_index (int tbl_id, int index)
00672 {
00673   SymTbl T = TBL + tbl_id;
00674   C_Symbol sym;
00675 
00676   if ((tbl_id < 0) || (tbl_id > C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE))
00677     C_assert (0, "C_forall: illegal tbl_id");
00678   if (index >= T->size)
00679     C_assert (0, "C_forall: illegal index value");
00680 
00681   sym = T->array;
00682   return sym[index].ptr;
00683 }
00685 int
00686 C_open_name_table (int max_size)
00687 {
00688   return C_open (max_size, C_MATCH_BY_EXACT_TYPE);
00689 }
00690 char *
00691 C_unique_name (int tbl_id, char *name)
00692 {
00693   SymTbl tbl = TBL + tbl_id;
00694   C_Symbol sym;
00695   if ((tbl_id < 0) || (tbl_id > C_MAX_SYMBOL_TABLE))
00696     C_assert (0, "C_unique_name: illegal tbl_id");
00697   sym = find_symbol (tbl, name, 1, 0);  /* find old entry */
00698   /* create a new symbol if necessary */
00699   if (sym->type == C_INVALID_SYMBOL)
00700     {
00701       sym = find_symbol (tbl, name, 1, 1);      /* find empty slot */
00702       sym->type = 1;
00703       sym->name = C_strsave (name);
00704     }
00705   return sym->name;
00706 }
